Title: A Mother of Color on Raising Children with Both Visible and Invisible Disabilities
Alternative_Titles: Ask the Advocate, Episode 3, Mothers on the Frontline Podcast
Personal_Names~Roles: Teresa Wright Johnson ~ interviewee | Dionne Bensonsmith ~ interviewer
Corporate_Names~Roles: Mothers on the Frontline ~ supporting host
Abstract: An advocate with MomBiz Boss and a mother of children who experience developmental and mental health challenges. She speaks about being a mother of color and the experiences of raising children with both visible and invisible disabilities.
Citations: Mothers on the Frontline Website: https://mothersonthefrontline.com ~ citation | Iowa Women's Archive: https://www.lib.uiowa.edu/iwa/ ~ citation | Apple Podcasts: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/mothers-on-the-frontline/id1267363688?mt=2&ls=1 ~ citation | Android: https://subscribeonandroid.com/mothersonthefrontline.com/feed/podcast/ ~ citation | Google Podcasts: https://www.google.com/podcasts?feed=aHR0cHM6Ly9tb3RoZXJzb250aGVmcm9udGxpbmUuY29tL2ZlZWQvcG9kY2FzdC8= ~ citation | Sticher: https://www.stitcher.com/podcast/mothers-on-the-frontline?refid=stpr ~ citation

Keywords: Advocacy | Physical Disabilities | Invisible Disabilities | Mocha Moms | Zaria's Song | Younger Years and Beyond | Learning Disabilities | Mental Health First Aid | ADHD | ADD

Title: Disruptive Mood Dysregulation Disorder and What a Good Day Looks Like
Alternative_Titles: Just Ask Mom Series, Episode 8, Mothers on the Frontline Podcast
Corporate_Names~Roles: Mothers on the Frontline ~ supporting host
Abstract: In this episode, we speak with a mother of three. Her eldest son has Disruptive Mood Dysregulation Disorder (DMDD). She discusses how the condition affects the family dynamic and what a good day looks like.
Citations: Mothers on the Frontline Website: https://mothersonthefrontline.com ~ citation | Iowa Women's Archive:  https://www.lib.uiowa.edu/iwa/ ~ citation | Apple Podcasts: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/mothers-on-the-frontline/id1267363688?mt=2&ls=1 ~ citation | Android: https://subscribeonandroid.com/mothersonthefrontline.com/feed/podcast/ ~ citation | Google Podcasts: https://www.google.com/podcasts?feed=aHR0cHM6Ly9tb3RoZXJzb250aGVmcm9udGxpbmUuY29tL2ZlZWQvcG9kY2FzdC8= ~ citation | Sticher: https://www.stitcher.com/podcast/mothers-on-the-frontline?refid=stpr ~ citation
